helicopterbattle

Class PlayerHelicopter

  • java.lang.Object
    • helicopterbattle.PlayerHelicopter

  • public class PlayerHelicopter
extends java.lang.Object
    Helicopter which is managed by player.

    • Method Detail

      • Reset

        public void Reset(int xCoordinate,
         int yCoordinate)
        Resets the player.
        Parameters:
        xCoordinate - Starting x coordinate of helicopter.
        yCoordinate - Starting y coordinate of helicopter.

      • isShooting

        public boolean isShooting(long gameTime)
        Checks if player is shooting. It also checks if player can shoot (time between bullets, does a player have any bullet left).
        Parameters:
        gameTime - The current elapsed game time in nanoseconds.
        Returns:
        true if player is shooting.

      • isFiredRocket

        public boolean isFiredRocket(long gameTime)
        Checks if player is fired a rocket. It also checks if player can fire a rocket (time between rockets, does a player have any rocket left).
        Parameters:
        gameTime - The current elapsed game time in nanoseconds.
        Returns:
        true if player is fired a rocket.

      • isMoving

        public void isMoving()
        Checks if player moving helicopter and sets its moving speed if player is moving.

      • Update

        public void Update()
        Updates position of helicopter, animations.

        public void Draw(java.awt.Graphics2D g2d)
        Draws helicopter to the screen.
        Parameters:
        g2d - Graphics2D
